name: Matt Douglas Collinsworth
bio: Matt Douglas Collinsworth earned his BA from Georgetown College and his MFA from Ohio State University. He received the 1995 Ruth Lilly Fellowship, and his poetry has appeared in journals such as Poetry, the Georgetown Review, and Appalachian Heritage Magazine, among other places. He is director of the Kentucky Folk Art Center and senior director of cultural outreach, preservation, and education at Morehead State University.
